featured.text: “Judo helped me a small boat that held 20 people and set sail into the by giving me serenity, discipline, commitment— deep waters of the Aegean Sea.

definition.zh_def: 平靜，安詳的狀態或感覺。
definition.en_def: The state of being calm, peaceful, and untroubled.
definition.example: She found serenity in the quiet of the early morning.
